text: Paul Wild is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s. He played at club level for Featherstone Rovers (Heritage № 633). ==Club career== Paul Wild made his début for Featherstone Rovers on Sunday 9 November 1986.Bailey, Ron (20 September 2001). Images of Sport - Featherstone Rovers Rugby League Football Club. title: Paul Wild (rugby league)
